name: Interdimensional Dreamdates
description:
Congratulations! You have been chosen to attend the interdimensional school! 

Here you will learn about everything interdimensional, from geography to biology to math (yes, even math is multiversal). But you won't just be learning about them. You'll be meeting people from all over the multiverse. How? They're you're classmates, that's how! It is your goal to befriend (or even date) several of the weird and wonderful beings you will meet here.

Who will be the lucky one that gets woo'd by your dashing friendship and romance? It's up to you. There's a whole multiverse for you to explore. Now, go into that portal and let's get to some interdimensional learning!

Created by Daniël van Baardwijk. All writing, art, music and sound effects were also created by him. He doesn't claim to be an expert on anything. He just wanted to see what he could do all by himself, including writing in the third person even though he himself is writing this.

Enjoy the game :)
